Festival Music
Molinnis Park, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK Chorus 'Worthy is the Lamb' from 'Messiah' - Handel: 1 Camborne Town, 88 2 Lucketts Travel, 80
Best Player: John Hitchens, euphonium, Camborne
Best Soprano: Jeremy Squibb, Camborne Best Solo Cornet: Darren Hendy, Camborne Best Euphonium: John Hitchens, Camborne Best Solo Horn: Graham Barker, Camborne Best Set of Basses: St. Keverne
A. R. Trudgian Youth Awards: Hannah Watkins, Neil Pascoe
